TopicTitle: MechJeb 2 - AR202 red/green lights - only suggestion

Articles.Content:
Hi,

It's only a simple suggestion about red & green lights (indicators) on AR202 case (MechJeb 2) :

1/ When AR202 is disabled (from right-click menu), both red & green are off (assuming it's not too difficult to implement).

2/ When AR202 is idle, red light is on (green is off).

3/ When AR202 is active (eg running autopilot), green is on, red is off.

Opinions from MJ users, of course, are welcome!

@sarbian: perhaps this feature will be planned for future MJ release? Merci.

Dominique.
Doesn't seem like a terrible idea. If he gets to it, I'd maybe suggest switching green to blue, to reduce issues with red-green colorblindness.

37 minutes ago, Starman4308 said:

Doesn't seem like a terrible idea. If he gets to it, I'd maybe suggest switching green to blue, to reduce issues with red-green colorblindness.

Threy're two separate indicators on AR202 case (one green + one red), and grey color (when off) already exist. Also, blue isn't a good idea (in my opinion) - useless and more complex.
OTOH, I've used ar202s as port/starboard lights on my craft.  Since I always have a custom window open, one was always green.  I simply disabled the other so it was always red.
I believe Indicator Lights would be able to help with that.  You might even be able to write an MM config file that does it.
